description.value: You have an incredibly nimble tail that helps you balance in zero gravity; this could be a hereditary gift from your ancestors as they adapted to spaceflight or the result of personal augmentation. You can use your tail to @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.actions.Item.FF5KgZHj345s2moq]{Push Off} while in zero-g. In addition, you ignore the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} penalties while @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.conditions.Item.z1ucw4CLwLqHoAp3]{Untethered} in zero gravity.
